name.baseName: 干馏工段|页岩原油|油页岩块|抚顺炉干馏技术工艺+末端治理措施为：干馏气治理|所有规模

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/
technology.technologicalApplicability: 抚顺炉干馏技术用于将油页岩块加工成页岩原油。该工艺与能源行业密切相关，特别是在油页岩是主要碳氢化合物来源的地区。工艺产生的干馏气作为副产品经过末端治理措施以减轻环境污染。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码25,四级代码2519文件，在完整版文件中第4111页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution cyanideisFloating separation + precipitation separation + biochemical treatment
污染物指标氰化物的末端治理技术是上浮分离+沉淀分离+生化处理，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氰化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氰化物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution ammoniaisOthers (water basin closed + loose exhaust gas is collected into heating furnace for combustion + double-layer discharge board)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management93
污染物指标氨的末端治理技术是其他（水盆封闭+散排放气体收集进加热炉燃烧+双层放料板），其效率为93，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氨，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution ammoniaisOthers (basin closed + double-layer discharge board)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management89
污染物指标氨的末端治理技术是其他（水盆封闭+双层放料板），其效率为89，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氨，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisOthers (basin closed + double-layer discharge board)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management88

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isOthers (direct discharge)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是其他（直接排放），其效率为0，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物

nan
